author: Staff Reporter
text:
Khaja Mohideen, a resident of Ranganathapuram in Tambaram, was killed when an unidentified vehicle hit his two-wheeler on the Puzhal-Tambaram Bypass Road near Kovur Bridge on Wednesday night.

A police official of the Poonamallee Traffic Investigation said Khaja (34) was proceeding on a two-wheeler towards Tambaram when he was knocked down by the speeding vehicle. He died on the spot. His body was sent to Government Chromepet Hospital for a post-mortem examination.

Man found dead on railway track

A body of an unidentified person was found on the railway tracks between Perambur and Vyasarpadi Jeeva railway stations on Thursday.

A police official said that based on information from commuters, the Government Railway Police recovered the body that had knife wounds in several places. The victim was wearing a khaki dress. The body was sent to Government Kilpauk Medical College Hospital for a post-mortem examination.
title: Motorcyclist run over by unidentified vehicle
